title: Trail of the Hawk (1935) YANCEY LANE

sources.title: Trail of the Hawk (1935) YANCEY LANE
sources.description:
Director: Edward Dmytryk 
Writer: James Oliver Curwood (story)
Stars: Yancey Lane, Betty Jordan, Dickie Jones

Famed filmmaker Edward Dmytryk cut his directing teeth on this bizarre western about a man who seeks out his Father after his mother passes away, and although he doesn't realize it falls in love with his long-lost sister.

TRIVIA: Independent producer Herman Wohl hired Paramount film editor Edward Dmytryk to direct this 1935 western, marking Dmytryk's first directing job. And his name was misspelled on the credits!
